entries.journal_entry_description: Collect an experimental Old Republic droid module, a Positional Awareness Triangulator Chip, that is installed in a mouse droid last known to be in the possession of some Skaak Tippers.
entries.journal_entry_title: Old Republic Droid Modules: The Mouse Droid
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Droid Module 1: Acquire the Positional Awareness Triangulator Chip from the mouse droid in the Skaak Tipper hideout near Kaadara.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Droid Module 1: Acquire It from the Mouse Droid
entries.task03_comm_message_text: [BEGIN TRANSMISSION]: Please return to the RSF mainframe in Theed. [END TRANSMISSION]
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Theed and update the RSF mainframe information about acquisition of the Positional Awareness Triangulator Chip.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Return to the RSF Mainframe in Theed
